Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior glazed black (partly worn) with two added white bands; exterior, slip worn: painted decoration consisting of griffin (lower jaw and part of neck remaining) to right.
Curator's comments: For other griffins on Chian pottery, see British Museum 1888,0601.472.k+.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1539) (phase 2)
